'''''Vinyar Tengwar 11''''' is the eleventh issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|10|12}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "'Now I am a burglar indeed', thought he" — Adam Christensen
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Two Problematic Quenya Noun Cases" — Jorge Quiñónez
* "The Love-song of Maglor" — trans. Eli Bar-Yahalom
* "''Essitalmar'': The Longswordsman" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Transitions in Translations: The Hobbit Glossary" (column) — Arden R. Smith
